about_the_game:
「TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods」is a 2.5D pixel action roguelike game. The story centers on the fateful battle between Koishi Komeiji and Hata no Kokoro.

Game Features

  • As a roguelike game, it features a unique twist on the traditional formula: instead of building up your own character, you construct enhancements for the enemy, creating a distinct and fresh gameplay experience.

  • Players take on the role of Koishi Komeiji, battling against the enemy Hata no Kokoro. However, the in-game progression involves enhancing Kokoro's power. The enemies in regular stages are Kokoro's various masks, which can also be empowered to become increasingly stronger.

  • Although Koishi has no in-game progression, there are abundant item cards to help you achieve significant meta-progression outside of each run.
    With numerous stages to challenge, you can make Kokoro exceptionally powerful to earn massive scores per run, or build a weaker Kokoro for a simpler and straightforward clear.

  • Supports online co-op for up to 4 players.

  • Welcome to the world of Touhou, and get ready to experience this exciting and thrilling adventure!

「TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods」is a 2.5D pixel action roguelike game. The story centers on the fateful battle between Koishi Komeiji and Hata no Kokoro.

Game Features

  • As a roguelike game, it features a unique twist on the traditional formula: instead of building up your own character, you construct enhancements for the enemy, creating a distinct and fresh gameplay experience.

  • Players take on the role of Koishi Komeiji, battling against the enemy Hata no Kokoro. However, the in-game progression involves enhancing Kokoro's power. The enemies in regular stages are Kokoro's various masks, which can also be empowered to become increasingly stronger.

  • Although Koishi has no in-game progression, there are abundant item cards to help you achieve significant meta-progression outside of each run.
    With numerous stages to challenge, you can make Kokoro exceptionally powerful to earn massive scores per run, or build a weaker Kokoro for a simpler and straightforward clear.

  • Supports online co-op for up to 4 players.

  • Welcome to the world of Touhou, and get ready to experience this exciting and thrilling adventure!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

name: TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 64bit
  • Processor: 2+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 「TouHou Koishi's Enchanted Woods」 is a Touhou fangame.This is a "reverse-construction" action rogue-lite.Koishi vs. Kokoro! But as the playable character, Koishi uses various enhancement cards to continuously strengthen Kokoro. Can she ultimately defeat the Kokoro she has built up herself?
